tripPlanner.description: Tailored itineraries based on your needs.

smartAssistant.title: Smart Travel Assistant
smartAssistant.description: Get instant answers from our AI chatbot.

SOS.title: Activate Emergency SOS?
SOS.description: This will immediately send your location and health passport details to your emergency contacts. Only use this in a genuine emergency.

TripPlanner.title: Personalized Trip Planner
TripPlanner.description: Let our AI craft the perfect accessible journey for you.
TripPlanner.formDescription: Fill in the details below to generate a personalized travel plan.
TripPlanner.interestsPlaceholder: e.g., Museums, nature, local cuisine, shopping
TripPlanner.resultDescription: Here is a travel plan designed just for you.

Assistant.title: Smart Travel Assistant
Assistant.description: Your AI-powered guide for accessible travel.
Assistant.placeholder: Ask about accessible hotels, transport, etc.

Maps.title: Accessible Maps
Maps.description: Explore accessible routes and points of interest in Qatar.

Support.title: Rights & Support Directory
Support.description: Find local rights information and support organizations.
Support.formDescription: Enter your location and disability to find relevant information.

Hosts.title: Solidarity Hosts
Hosts.description: Connect with friendly local volunteers for assistance and companionship.

Translate.title: Sign Language Translator
Translate.description: Translate spoken or written language into sign language visuals.
Translate.formDescription: Enter the text you want to see translated into sign language.
Translate.resultDescription: A visual representation of the translated text.

Passport.title: Digital Health Passport
Passport.description: Securely store and manage your essential information for travel.
Passport.formDescription: This data can be shared with airlines and hotels to ensure your needs are met. It is always kept private and secure.
Passport.disabilityInfoPlaceholder: e.g., I am a wheelchair user and require step-free access. I have a hearing impairment and need visual alerts.
Passport.disabilityInfoDescription: Describe your condition and any specific accessibility requirements.
Passport.medicalNeedsPlaceholder: e.g., Allergic to peanuts. Require access to refrigeration for medication.

sosDialog.title: Activate Emergency SOS?
sosDialog.description: This will immediately send your location and health passport details to your emergency contacts.

register.terms: By registering, you agree to the terms and conditions.
